view

Class openingdialog

  • java.lang.Object
    • view.openingdialog

  • public class openingdialog
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is from where the game starts 1. asks player to play game or edit map 2. displays frame for those options
    Version:
    2.0
    Author:
    Harman

      • getInput

        public int getInput(int minimum,
                    int maximum,
                    java.lang.String message)
        Ask user to enter an integer value for spinner.
        Parameters:
        minimum - Minimum value for the spinner.
        maximum - Maximum value for the Spinner.
        message - The message to be displayed on the spinner.
        Returns:
        number of players entered by user or by default 2.

        Returns:
        readMap Stores the absolute path of the map file read.
